title: Change Taliyah's Ultimate!
body: So, i think Taliyah's ultimate is uselles! Maybe you should change it to something like Ahri's ultimate , or something, that deals damage! :){{champion:163}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3089}}

replies.body:
If you think Taliyah's ultimate is useless then you have no imagination or capacity for strategic thought.

That being said I do wonder if perhaps being hit by the wall as it forms could deal a bit of damage in addition to knocking people aside, though it's primary focus would still be the ability to blockade lanes and segments of jungle to barricade enemies in, or even just riding it as an escape or engage.
If it's useless, then she wouldn't be in such a nerfed state right now.
